column2: The Amalfi peninsula has long been the home of a fiercely-independent merchant republic. Let us formalise this independence by proclaiming a new Duchy of Amalfi!
We believe that the islands of Canarias should be viewed as their own separate island entity, unrelated to the mainland.
We believe that the islands of Kutch should be viewed as their own separate entity, unrelated to the mainland.
Create the Duchy of the Maldives
We believe that the islands of the Maldives should be viewed as their own separate entity, unrelated to the mainland.
We believe that the islands of Malta should be viewed as their own separate island entity, unrelated to the mainland.
We believe that the island of Rhodes should be viewed as its own separate island entity, unrelated to the mainland.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] is NOT de jure liege of the §Y[This.GetFullName]§!
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] (or one of [Root.GetHerHis] vassals) does NOT own another county title in the same de jure duchy as the §Y[This.GetFullName]§!
The §Y[Prev.GetFullName]§! becomes de jure part of the §Y[This.GetFullName]§!
The §Y[This.GetFullName]§! is held by [Root.GetTitledFirstName] or one of [Root.GetHerHis] vassals
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] is a human player, and "shattering mode" is turned on
The de jure duchy containing the §Y[This.GetFullName]§! has no holder, or is held by [Root.GetTitledFirstName], or is held by one of [Root.GetHerHis] vassals
Every count-tier title in the de jure duchy containing the §Y[This.GetFullName]§! is held by [Root.GetTitledFirstName] or one of [Root.GetHerHis] vassals
